name: discord-utilities
title: Control Your Discord Client with Ease.
description: Control Your Discord Client With Ease.
author: nazzy_wazzy_lu

commands.name: refresh
commands.title: Force Refresh Data
commands.description: Refreshes all Discord data and populates the cache to improve loading times for other commands.

preferences.name: discordToken
preferences.title: Discord Token
preferences.description: Your Discord user token. This is required for the extension to work. Be aware of the risks of using a user token.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
